commit message: Merge branch 'release/4.9' into release/5.0
drop android-cq plugin

New resource file: key_strings.xml

* Moved key strings to their own file to unclutter the main strings.xml file (they're de facto untranslatable)
* Marked self reference strings untranslatable

Merge branch 'release/4.9' into release/5.0
5.0-rc-2 release candidate

Keep postFormats since api call doesn't return it

Along with postFormatKeys. Otherwise the current values of those are overwritten by the mSettings.copyFrom(mRemoteSettings) call.

The actuall remote settings for postFormats is retrieved via a separate (XMLRPC) api call.
Cache the retrieved postFormats settings

Remove SiteSettingsModel.postFormatKeys

Keeping it around adds complexity and state handling. Instead, the data (keys) already live in SiteSettingsModel.postFormats. As a bonus, this fixes the issue of the empty list when tapping the post formats preference.

Protect postFormats in Selfhosted case as well

Same as in a dotcom site, the general options api call does not contain the list of post formats available so need to protect the cached list from being overwritten.
Catching potential NPE's when modifying settings collections
